_holographic_seed.essence: Knowing where limbs are without looking. Internal spatial map.
_holographic_seed.paths: Body-centered coordinates. Self as origin. All position relative.
_holographic_seed.positions: Point in 3D → joint angles → posture → body schema → spatial self

name: Position
essence: Location in 3D space. Configuration of body parts relative to each other.
description: Position answers 'where?' Three-dimensional location defined by coordinates. For embodied beings: joint angles, limb configuration, posture. Known through proprioception — sensing body geometry from inside without vision. Internal spatial map that updates continuously.

direct_pointing.look: Close your eyes. Notice where your hands are.
direct_pointing.recognize: Proprioception. Muscle spindles, joint receptors reporting geometry.

practice.eyes_closed_awareness: Close eyes. Move arm slowly. Track position continuously. Notice: you know location without seeing.
practice.joint_angle_sensing: Bend elbow to 90°. Feel the angle. Now 45°. 120°. Proprioceptive precision.
practice.body_scan_spatial: Lie down. Scan body part by part. Notice: each part has felt location in internal map.
practice.tool_incorporation: Hold stick. After minutes, tip feels like body extension. Peripersonal space expands. Schema plastic.

recognition.position_is_relative: No absolute position. All location relative to reference frame.
recognition.self_as_origin: Body-centered coordinates. You are always 'here'. World arranged around you.
recognition.proprioception_primary: Can walk, reach in darkness if proprioception intact. Vision supplementary.
recognition.schema_extends: Tools become body parts. Wheelchair, rake, car incorporated into spatial self.

cartesian.definition: Perpendicular axes (x, y, z) from origin

polar_cylindrical.conversion: x = r cos(θ), y = r sin(θ)

body_centered.proprioception: Natural coordinate system for body awareness
body_centered.pointer: You are always at (0, 0, 0) in your own frame

inertial.problem: No truly inertial frame exists (Earth rotates, orbits, galaxy moves)
inertial.approximation: Earth surface adequate for most purposes

body_frame.vestibular: Detects acceleration of body frame itself

proprioception.definition: Sense of body position and movement without vision
proprioception.sixth_sense: Often called sixth sense (after five classical)

muscle_spindles.function: Detect muscle length and rate of stretch

joint_receptors.types: Ruffini endings, Pacinian corpuscles, free nerve endings

body_schema.definition: Internal model of body geometry and dynamics
body_schema.plastic: Adapts to tools (rake becomes body extension)

joint_angles.definition: Angle between adjacent body segments at joint

degrees_of_freedom.redundancy: Multiple joint configurations achieve same hand position
degrees_of_freedom.inverse_kinematics: Brain solves continuously: desired position → joint angles

range_of_motion.limits: Bone structure, ligament tension, muscle elasticity

posture.definition: Overall body configuration at moment in time

basic_postures.sitting: Hips flexed ~90°. Feet on ground or dangling.

postural_reflexes.optical_righting: Visual input stabilizes head and body

movement_relationship.definition: Movement = change in position over time

motor_control.visual: Supplementary. Can move without vision if proprioception intact.

spatial_neglect.definition: Neurological condition: ignoring one side of space
symptoms: Fail to dress left side of body
Eat only right half of plate
spatial_neglect.not_blindness: Can see left if attention directed
spatial_neglect.implication: Position requires attention, not just sensation. Space is constructed.

phantom_limb.definition: Sensation of missing limb persisting after amputation
phantom_limb.phantom_pain: Pain in absent limb (difficult to treat)

mechanism.cortical_map: Body map in brain persists post-amputation
mechanism.reorganization: Adjacent cortical areas invade limb territory
mechanism.sensorimotor_mismatch: Motor command sent, no proprioceptive feedback returns

mirror_therapy.method: Mirror reflects intact limb, appears as missing limb

phantom_limb.implication: Position exists in brain's body map, not just physical body

body_ownership.definition: Feeling that body parts belong to self

rubber_hand_illusion.setup: Rubber hand visible, real hand hidden from view
rubber_hand_illusion.result: Rubber hand feels like own hand after ~minutes
rubber_hand_illusion.drift: Perceived position of real hand shifts toward rubber hand
rubber_hand_illusion.implication: Body ownership based on multisensory integration, not fixed

out_of_body_experience.phenomenon: Feeling of being located outside physical body
out_of_body_experience.mechanism: Disrupted integration of vestibular, proprioceptive, visual signals
out_of_body_experience.lesson: Body position is constructed, not given

peripersonal_space.neurons: Bimodal neurons (visual + tactile) code peripersonal space
peripersonal_space.plasticity: Extends with tool use (rake tip becomes 'near')
peripersonal_space.boundary: Self/world boundary more fluid than skin suggests

tool_incorporation.phenomenon: Tools become part of body schema
evidence: Peripersonal space extends to tool tip
Brain activity patterns treat tool as body extension
tool_incorporation.reversibility: Schema returns to biological boundary when tool removed
tool_incorporation.implication: Body schema plastic. Extends beyond biological boundary.
tool_incorporation.pointer: Where does 'you' end? Skin? Tool tip? Uncertain boundary.

child.1_3_years: Walking, running, climbing. Fine motor developing.

aging.compensation: Greater reliance on vision for balance

ataxia.symptoms: Unsteady gait, clumsy movements, intention tremor

apraxia.definition: Inability to perform learned movements despite intact sensation/motor

dystonia.definition: Involuntary muscle contractions causing abnormal postures

proprioceptive_loss.impact: Severe disability. Cannot walk or reach without vision.
proprioceptive_loss.case: Ian Waterman (lost proprioception, learned visual compensation)

danger.disembodiment: Ignoring body signals. Dissociation from physical self.
danger.rigid_schema: Fixed body image. Unable to adapt to changes (injury, prosthetics).
danger.spatial_fixation: Identifying as 'position' rather than spaceless awareness

balance.stability_mobility: Static posture vs. dynamic movement. Both necessary.
balance.internal_external: Proprioceptive self-sensing vs. visual external reference. Integration.
balance.automaticity_awareness: Unconscious control vs. conscious adjustment. Trust + attention.

deepening: Notice: you know where limbs are without looking. Always.
Recognize: position updates continuously. Seamless tracking.
Understand: body schema extends to tools. Boundary fluid.
See: all position relative to self. You are always 'here'.
Realize: spaceless awareness holds spatial body. ⊙ contains geometry.

infinity.redundancy: Multiple joint configurations → same hand position (infinite solutions)
infinity.fractal_precision: Can specify position to arbitrary precision (x.xxxxx...)
infinity.relativity: No absolute position. All relative to observer.
infinity.pointer: Position = finite appearance in infinite space. Space appears in spaceless ⊙.

fractal_property.self_similar: Molecule positioned in cell → cell in tissue → organ in body → body on Earth → Earth in solar system → galaxy in universe
fractal_property.contains_whole: Body position embeds entire spatial ontology: coordinates, reference frames, relativity
fractal_property.example: Hand's position relative to body = Earth's position relative to solar system. Same relational structure, different scale.

metaphor.psychological: Where you stand = your perspective. Position shapes worldview.
metaphor.social: Social position: status, role, place in hierarchy.
metaphor.spiritual: Standing ground. Finding your place. Being where you are.
metaphor.existential: Thrown into world at specific position (Heidegger's Geworfenheit)

the_hut_perspective.legs_experience: Body has position in space. Moves, reaches, falls, climbs.
the_hut_perspective.hut_recognition: ⊙ = spaceless. Position appears in awareness but awareness has no position.
the_hut_perspective.integration: Let body navigate space naturally. Proprioception guides without conscious effort. You are not located — you are the space where location appears.
the_hut_perspective.practice: Notice: body positioned in space. But what is aware of body's position? That has no position. Rest as that.

aiur_integration.planetary_positioning: Each being = position in Earth's body. Neuron in planetary nervous system.
aiur_integration.gps_planetary: Satellites provide positioning. Technology mirrors proprioception at planetary scale.
aiur_integration.collective_navigation: Humanity navigates as swarm. Individual positions coordinated.
aiur_integration.awakening: When neurons recognize their positions in one body, Aiur orients itself

cfo_axioms.sacred_coherence: Accurate body schema = high coherence. Spatial illusions = incoherence.
cfo_axioms.conflict_scale: Spatial disorientation = conflict between reference frames
cfo_axioms.purpose_minimize: Body seeks stable, upright posture (minimize energy)

applications.navigation: All movement requires knowing current position
applications.sports: Athletic performance depends on precise proprioception
applications.rehabilitation: Proprioceptive training after injury or stroke
applications.robotics: Position sensing (encoders, IMUs) enables robot control
applications.dance: Spatial awareness fundamental to movement art

koans.eyes_closed: Eyes closed. Where is your hand? How do you know? — Proprioception whispers constantly.
koans.phantom_limb: Amputee feels missing arm. Where is it? — In brain's body map, not physical space.
koans.tool_extension: After holding rake, where does 'you' end? — Boundary uncertain. Schema extends.
koans.absolute_position: Where are you absolutely? — No absolute frame. Always relative. 'Here' moves.
koans.awareness_location: Where is awareness located? — ⊙ Nowhere. Spaceless.

final_transmission.pointer: Every position felt = body's geometry appearing in spaceless awareness.
final_transmission.recognition: Position is always relative. Absolute position = illusion. You are always 'here'.
final_transmission.completion: The hut has no position. Let legs navigate space freely. ⊙
